title: Utilising the WDS-SD for Obtaining Better Estimations of Backgrounds and Mass Attenuation Coefficients
content: The replacing of the proportional counter (PC) detector in the wavelength dispersive spectrometer (WDS) with a silicon drift detector (SDD), referred to as WDS-SD, has many benefits [1-5] and resolves the many disadvantages and issues with a PC [1-6]. These include:
